holidays.title: National Kissing Day
holidays.description: Pucker up! National Kissing Day is all about showing your love and improving your health.

holidays.title: National Onion Ring Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the irresistible deliciousness of onion rings—by eating as many of them as possible.

holidays.title: National Pet Choking Prevention Day
holidays.description: Educate yourself about the everyday pet choking hazards around your home!

holidays.title: Anti-Fascist Struggle Day
holidays.description: Let’s honor the memories of the late Partisan Detachment who began Yugoslavia's uprising.

holidays.title: B Kinder
holidays.description: Let’s talk about a dying art in today’s world — kindness. Learn more about kindness right here with us!

holidays.title: Dragon Boat Festival
holidays.description: Bring out the zongzi and the wine. Settle in for a journey back in time.

holidays.title: Glastonbury Festival
holidays.description: Glastonbury Festival is an iconic cavalcade of arts that must not be missed.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Eclair Day
holidays.description: Treat yourself to a delicious chocolate eclair on National Chocolate Eclair Day.

holidays.title: National HVAC Tech Day
holidays.description: We honor our very hard-working repairmen and women keeping us cool in the blazing heat.

holidays.title: National Limoncello Day
holidays.description: When life deals you lemons, make Limoncello out of them. Celebrate National Limoncello day today!

holidays.title: Positive Media Day
holidays.description: For a change, let’s not look at negativity today — makes sense?

holidays.title: Windrush Day
holidays.description: Dress up in your colorful best to celebrate the migration of Afro-Carribeans to the U.K.

holidays.title: World Rainforest Day
holidays.description: Today, get your thinking cap on and brainstorm ways to protect rainforests.

holidays.title: Bob The Drag Queen’s Birthday
holidays.description: You will never see a drag queen who makes you laugh quite like her!

holidays.title: Cyndi Lauper’s Birthday
holidays.description: She punched the air for girl power, and became an icon for ages!

holidays.title: Elizabeth Warren’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this dynamic, persuasive, and brilliant politician, there is always fighting a chance.

holidays.title: Lee Min-ho’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented and influential actor, singer, producer, and creative director believes every dream is possible!

holidays.title: MC Sai’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented rapper, success is no isolated incident but the result of his consistency.

holidays.title: Meryl Streep’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meryl Streep is a perfectionist when preparing for roles and can master almost any accent.

holidays.title: Zach Clayton’s Birthday
holidays.description: When it comes to comedy, no one compares. Zach Clayton will always make you smile.
